Package it.polimi.se2018.model

Class Die

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.Die
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Die
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class used to represent a Die
    Author:
    Matteo Gagliano, Carmelo Fascella, Generoso Imparato
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Die​(Die die)
      Copy constructor
      Die​(Color color)
      Constructor that creates a Die of the color passed by parameter and random value (range 1 to 6)

      Inverts the Die side

      • isSameDie

        public boolean isSameDie​(Die die)
        This method checks if the Die passed by parameter is exactly the same of this Die. Concretely it checks if the Id are the same.
        Parameters:
        die - die to confront
        Returns:
        true if the dice are the same, false otherwise
